ygData.subject: What is a PvP zone?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard some people on the list serve mention PvP zones what are they? Also, on a seperate note, I am having the problem where one of my songs will get
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard some people on the list serve mention PvP zones what are they?

Also, on a seperate note, I am having the problem where one of my songs will
get stuck on and I can't turn it off to switch songs. This is very annoying.
It won't turn off till I zone or camp and come back. Any idea how I can
prevent this? I think it is a bug or something. Has anyone else had this
problem.

Thank you,
Jira on Prexus
lvl 17 bard
